title: Hey Duggee - Super Squirrel Badge
cardDescription: The Super Squirrel Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 6 and has a letter of a red 'S' on a yellow seven-pointed star with a yellow shield-shape frame.
description: The Super Squirrel Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 6 and has a letter of a red 'S' on a yellow seven-pointed star with a yellow shield-shape frame.

content.content: Badge is worked as a spiral so no joining rounds until the outer edge.

content: 2 sc, (4 sc in next st, 3 sc) x2, 4 sc in next st, sc [21]
4 sc, (4 sc in next st, 6 sc) x2, 4 sc in next st, 2 sc [30]
ch 2, 5 dc, (2 dc, 2 sc) in next st, 9 sc, 4 sc in next st, 9 sc, (2 sc, 2 dc) in next st, 3 dc, slst to 2nd ch [39]
with SC slst, 6 hdc, (4 hdc in next st, 12 hdc) x2, 4 hdc in next st, 5 hdc where last one is made to the slst, slst [48]

content.content: Fasten off and hide the yarn ends.

content: with yellow, 7 sc into magic loop, slst
(ch 3, slst to 2nd ch from hook, sc, slst to next st) x7

content.content: Pin the chain to the badge to form an S shape. Sew in place.
